extraction.title: "Show members" has no effect
extraction.description: Using a 2013 Nexus 7, channels show the members on the right even when the "Show members" option is not selected in Display Options. Selecting it and deselecting it does nothing. I also tried clearing data on the app, but there was no change.Video showing the behavior: http://youtu.be/zKj-MF-R58AI'm not sure what else to provide to help debug, so let me know if you need anything else.
